message.entry: The {0} block cannot be added into ''{1}'' because the {2} block ''{3}'' already exists.
The block ''{0}'' is continuous, which is not supported for synchronous semantics.
同步语义不支持模块 ''{0}''。有关详细信息，请查看产品文档。
The block ''{0}'' uses continuous sample time, which is not supported for synchronous semantics. Consider using discrete sample time.
模块 ''{0}'' 是多速率模块，但嵌套在具有同步语义的条件执行子系统 ''{1}'' 中。不支持此操作。
The block ''{0}'' gets variable size signals, which are not supported for synchronous semantics.
模块 ''{0}'' 包含同步语义不支持的帧信号。
模块 ''{0}'' 具有同步语义不支持的消息端口。

In block ''{0}'', the parameter 'Input processing' is set to 'Columns as channels (frame based)'. Frame based processing is not supported for synchronous semantics. Consider setting this parameter to 'Elements as channels (sample based)'.
模块 ''{0}'' 将 ''时域'' 参数设置为 ''连续时间''，同步语义不支持该设置。

The block ''{0}'' is not compliant with synchronous semantics. Depending on different configurations, this block may or may not support synchronous semantics for state control. Please check the product documentation for more details.

The block ''{0}'' only supports synchronous semantics for state control. Consider inserting a State Control block and setting 'State control' parameter to 'Synchronous'. Please see the block documentation for more details.
模块 ''{0}'' 使用经过时间，这不符合同步语义。
The trigger port block ''{0}'' is not supported for synchronous semantics.
同步语义不支持触发端口模块 ''{0}''，因为其父级子系统也包含使能端口模块 ''{1}''。
The From Workspace block ''{0}'' is not supported for synchronous semantics.
模块 ''{0}'' 不符合同步语义，因为它可能具有状态，并且嵌套在子系统 ''{1}'' 中，该子系统具有组合的输出和更新方法。
Model 模块 ''{0}'' 不符合同步语义，因为它嵌套在具有组合的输出和更新方法的子系统中，并且引用模型可能具有状态。

Block ''{0}'' is not compliant with synchronous semantics because it has states and is in a referenced model with ''CombineOutputUpdateFcns'' on. Turn <sldiag objui="configset" objparam="CombineOutputUpdateFcns">Single output/update function</sldiag> off.

The state control block ''{0}'' specifies classic semantics. It cannot be placed inside a subsystem that uses synchronous semantics. Use State Control blocks with the same settings for the 'State control' parameter.
The block ''{0}'' has an external reset port enabled but is nested inside conditionally executed subsystem ''{1}'' with synchronous semantics. This is not supported.
The subsystem ''{0}'' uses synchronous semantics but is nested inside conditionally executed subsystem ''{1}'' with classic semantics. This is not supported.
子系统 ''{0}'' 使用同步语义，但嵌套在具有经典语义的条件执行模型中。不支持此操作。
在基于 Simulink 的状态中，顶层不允许使用 State Control 模块 ''{0}''。
The model block ''{0}'' refers to a model which has synchronous semantics. However, this model is nested inside conditionally executed subsystem ''{1}'' with classic semantics. This is not supported.

All branches of the action block ''{0}'' should use classic or synchronous semantics consistently. The action subsystem block(s) {1} uses synchronous semantics, while the action subsystem block(s) {2} uses classic semantics. This is not supported.
